name: HexLinx
description:
HexLinx is an intriguing collection of 3 different puzzle games, all using the same method of rearranging tiles to form Clusters, Rings, or Chains. Simply tap two tiles to have them trade places. All puzzles can be played in two different ways -- Fewest Moves or Fastest Time. Whether you like a soothing, relaxing experience or prefer
a frenetic time-trial mode, you'll have plenty of variety to choose from. With 90 different grids ranging from simple & casual to complex & difficult -- HexLinx is fun, challenging and engaging for players of all skill levels. So if you're looking for something totally different and totally fun, download HexLinx today!

Game Features :
- Crisp colorful graphics with pleasant sound effects
- Super-smooth action with seamless User Interface
- View unobstructed solved puzzles after completion
- Optional visual effects and tile patterns for low-light
conditions and color-impaired players
- No annoying, distracting ads
